--- title: Maximo Application Suite --- IBM Maximo® Application Suite (MAS) helps drive operational resiliency and reliability. With expanded access to EAM, Health, Predict, Monitor and asset performance management applications, your team can reach across the enterprise to unify operations and maintain business continuity, even under rapidly changing or disruptive conditions. Key capabilities of Maximo Application Suite: - Integrated suite of applications. For example, Manage, Health, Predict, Monitor - Simplified licensing including single contract and pricing metric - Hybrid-cloud deployment - Comprehensive view of your assets ## Architecture ![image](images/masarch.png)

- MAS includes applications: Manage, Health, Predict, Assist, Safety, Monitor, IoT, MVI. - [IBM Cloud Pak for Data](https://www.ibm.com/support/producthub/icpdata/docs/content/SSQNUZ_latest/cpd/overview/overview.html) can run on your Red Hat® OpenShift® cluster. It offers AI-infused services for business and IT operations, development, data science and management. - Mongo database can exist in cluster, cloud or outside cluster. - User, Application, Entitlement metadata is stored in Mongo database. For example, OIDC (OpenID Connect) registration, User management. - IBM® Event Streams is a fully Managed Apache Kafka-As-A-Service Platform for Cloud. Mange application in the suite can be configured to use Kafka service. - Manage support all three databases (DB2, Oracle, Sql Server) - Manage can be configured to use cloud services such as Cloud Object Storage, block or file storage.
